s.text: But this general level of gravity is apparent in the WSJ 's quote from an arms control advocate describing the "nuclear domino effect" that could have just been unleashed: "If we don't ratify, Pakistan and India won't either.
The man, Sam Cohen, worked at the store for 46 years, after barely escaping the Holocaust, which claimed most of his family.
From there, it is easy to foresee Russia following suit.
